org.ljtoolkit.client
Class LJClientService

java.lang.Object
  org.ljtoolkit.client.LJClientService

public class LJClientService
extends java.lang.Object

The purpose of this class is to provide services to the LJClient class. The LJClient class serves as the driver for by parsing the command line and in turn calling on the services of this class.

Author:
Troy Bourdon
See Also:
LJClient
